actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To amend Title 10 of the US Code to provide that abortions, sterilizations, and family planning services be performed in facilities of the uniformed services, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that medical care for former members of the uniformed service shall include abortions, sterilizations, and family planning services and authorizes such medical treatment to be performed in facilities of the uniformed services. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1074, 1089)

titles.title: To amend Title 10 of the US Code to provide that abortions, sterilizations, and family planning services be performed in facilities of the uniformed services, and for other purposes.
